subject: X Games
Skateboards
lead_paragraph: Pedro Barros, a 15-year-old from Brazil, beat Andy MacDonald, 37, to win Skateboard Park on the closing day of the X Games in Los Angeles.
snippet: Pedro Barros, a 15-year-old from Brazil, beat Andy MacDonald, 37, to win Skateboard Park on the closing day of the X Games in Los Angeles.
